name: sakura-monorepo
description: Sakura monorepo containing dashboard, widget, and backend services

scripts.build: npm run build:dashboard && npm run build:widget
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:dashboard" "npm run start:widget" "npm run start:backend"
scripts.lint: npm run lint:dashboard && npm run lint:widget
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=dashboard && npm install --workspace=widget
scripts.clean: npm run clean:dashboard && npm run clean:widget
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv && venv\Scripts\activate && uvicorn main:app --reload
